member.name: T:Eneter.JsonNet.JsonNetSerializer
member.summary: EneterJsonNetSerializer is a serializer for Eneter Messaging Framework based on popular Json.NET serializer.
member.remarks: This serializer is intended to be used with Eneter Messaging Framework to serialize/deserialize messages. The implementation of the serializer is based on Json.NET serializer created by James Newton-King. http://www.newtonsoft.com/json

member.name: M:Eneter.JsonNet.JsonNetSerializer.Deserialize``1(System.Object)
member.typeparam: Type of the object which shall be deserialized.
member.param: JSON serialized string which shall be deserialized.

member.name: M:Eneter.JsonNet.JsonNetSerializer.Serialize``1(``0)
member.typeparam: Type of the objec which shall be serialized.
member.param: instance of the object which shall be serialized.
